actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should fill the 1982 vacancy on the Federal Reserve board with a person of substantial small business or agricultural experience.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of Congress that the President should fill the 1982 vacancy on the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System with a person of substantial small business or farming experience who can genuinely represent the interests and needs of independent businesses and producers in the formation of our Nation's monetary policy.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should fill the 1982 vacancy on the Federal Reserve board with a person of substantial small business or agricultural experience.
